description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission ref: P120351 comprising internal amendments to the circulation core; and external changes to the south east elevation comprising a 400mm recess to the area around the fire escape door, and repositioning of the fire escape door.
decision_conditions:
This decision confirms the Council's agreement that following alternative wording of condition 2 of permission P120351 is acceptable:

"DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

1848_001; 002; 003; 004; 005; 1848-4-P-000: 1000 Rev A; 1001 Rev C; 1010 Rev F; 1011 Rev A; 1012 Rev C; 1848-4-E-000: 2000 Rev A; 2010 Rev A; 2011 Rev C; 2012 Rev A; 2013 Rev A; 1848-00-DR-0100 Rev D03; Design & Access Statement - Feb 2012 (Including Visual Impact Assessment); Folio containing: covering letter, application form and certificates, site location plan, drawing schedule, accommodation schedule, Town Planning Statement, Addendum to the Heritage & Urban Design Appraisal; Transport Assessment; Draft Travel Plan; Health Impact Assessment; Sustainable Design & Construction Statement; Energy Assessment; Microclimate report; Ventilation Report; Land Contamination Assessment; Student Accommodation Supply & Demand Study; Site Waste Management Plan; Operational Waste Management Plan; CIL form and Student Management Plan dated February 2012.  

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning."
